name: Beat Invoker
description:
My entry to the 2-Buttons Jam 2019

Invoke your spells by inputting the correct key combination while staying in the rhythm and kill your enemies before they can reach you. 

After every round you can choose between two spells to add to your spellbook.

Music from:

Kevin MacLeod(Incompetech) EDM Detection Mode (changed from 128bpm to 120bpm)

Sprites from:

Player Character by Hugues Laborde

Skeleton by Jesse M.

Knight from OcO

Minotaur by Elthen

Hearts by Fliflifly

UI assets by kenney
